explains: n. 拦截，截住；截断，截取；侦听，窃听

sentences.en: The authentication mechanisms' implementation might have weaknesses and allow, for example, credential interception and replay.
sentences.cn: 身份验证机制的实现可能存在弱点，比如准许凭证拦截和重播。

sentences.en: Use interception and AOP to attach services to POJOs
sentences.cn: 使用拦截和 AOP，将服务与 POJO 相关联

sentences.en: Other standard metrics also fit the interception pattern.
sentences.cn: 其他的指标同样适合截取模式。
